column1: The submarine sites ST07, ST12, and ST09, located in the Prony Bay, were sampled at 16 meters below sea level ( mbsl), 38 mbsl, and 48 mbsl, respectively.
Boreholes sampled during this investigation include 07V140M03 and 09V250M02 drilled from the Ventilation shaft, and three depths within 08E140C01 drilled from the East shaft.
